name: tm40
effect: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Defense Curl Gen I: Skull Bash)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user confounds the foe with speed, then strikes. The attack lands without fail.
flavor_text.platinum: The user confounds the foe with speed, then strikes. The attack lands without fail.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user confounds the foe with speed, then strikes. The attack lands without fail.
